title: Business Analyst
description:
Job Description

We’re seeking an experienced CX Business Analyst to design and implement innovative contact center solutions that enhance customer experience and drive business growth. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of customer requirements and best practices in the contact center space. If you have a passion for delivering exceptional customer experiences and a proven track record of success in contact center solutions, we’d love to hear from you.




Mandatory Skills

business analysis, Business Consulting, Requirement Analysis, Functional Analysis, Gap Analysis, Brd, contact center, Cisco Unified Communications, Genesys, amazon connect

Show more
